item.title: 自去年 10 月哈马斯袭击以色列以来，欧洲天然气批发价格暴跌--这在当时是始料未及的如欲了解这对经济形势的影响，请阅读我的时事通讯
item.description:
Forward European wholesale gas prices have plummeted since the Hamas attacks on Israel last October - that was not expected at the time

For more on what this means for economic scenarios

Read my newsletterhttps://t.co/9W1LiN2e7a pic.twitter.com/RXBxmDevhZ

— Chris Giles (@ChrisGiles_) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在乔-拜登的领导下，石油和天然气行业的利润增长了两倍，尽管该行业对他大加挞伐，并警告他的连任将给该行业带来 "灾难性 "影响 @mylesmccormick_ via @ft
item.description:
Oil and gas profits triple under Joe Biden even as industry decries him and warns a second term would be "disastrous" for the sector @mylesmccormick_ https://t.co/umaTZVhHEH via @ft

— Jamie Smyth (@JamieSmythF) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在乔-拜登总统的领导下，美国最大的石油和天然气生产商的利润几乎增长了两倍，尽管该行业斥责拜登政府的 "敌对 "政策
item.description:
Profits for the biggest US oil and gas producers have almost tripled under President Joe Biden, even as the industry berates his administration’s 'hostile' policies https://t.co/t5G36C9KuV pic.twitter.com/YMZVcfoDn6

— Financial Times (@FT) February 27, 2024

item.description:
